content: अभिषेकः {@--1@} Sprinkling, watering, wetting. {@--2@} Anointing, inaugurating or consecrating by sprinkling water (a king, idol &c.). {@--3@} (Particularly) Coronation, inauguration, installation (of kings); royal unction; अथाभिषेकं रघुवंशकेतोः <ls>R. 14. 7.</ls> {@--4@} The (holy) water required at inauguration, coronation water; अमात्यपरिषदं ब्रूहि संभ्रियतामायुषो राज्याभिषेक इति <ls>V. 5</ls>; यौवराज्य° {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%}; <ls>R. 17. 14.</ls> {@--5@} Bathing; ablution, holy or religious bathing; अभिषेकोत्तीर्णाय काश्यपाय <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; अत्राभिषेकाय तपोधनानां <ls>R. 13. 51</ls>, <ls n="R.">1. 85</ls>, <ls n="R.">10. 63</ls>, <ls n="R.">13. 58</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 82</ls>; <ls>K. 22</ls>, <ls n="K.">36</ls>, <ls n="K.">96</ls>; <ls>Ku. 5. 16</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 11</ls>; <ls>Ś. 7. 12</ls>; <ls>H. 4. 87.</ls> {@--6@} Bathing or sprinkling with water (of a divinity to whom worship is offered).
